text: The North American Hyundai Accent was a car produced by Hyundai Motor Company from 1994 to 2022. It was the successor of the Pony, and it was in its fifth generation until recently. The car was also sold in Mexico as the Dodge Verna from 2001 to 2006, and as the Dodge Attitude until 2014, when Hyundai entered the Mexican market. Currently, the Hyundai Accent continues in production, except in North America. Accent Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Hyundai Accent
